name: calix-axos
description: Comprehensive Cribl pack for Calix AXOS syslog events. Parses and enriches all AXOS syslog facilities including command logs (LOCAL6), alarm/event notifications (LOCAL7), and all category-specific facilities (SECURITY, ARC, CONFIGURATION, DBCHANGE, GENERAL, ERPS, TCA, OAM, PON, PORT, DHCP, RSTP, LAG, G8032, NTP, LACP, ENVIRONMENTAL, NTWCLK). Includes security event detection, MITRE ATT&CK mapping, and configuration change tracking.
author: Nathan Bray

parameters.name: enable_polling_suppression
parameters.label: Suppress Polling Noise
parameters.description: Suppress repetitive AT-OPERATION COMPLD events (automated polling). Deduplicates by user and command xpath over the suppression window.

parameters.name: suppression_window_sec
parameters.label: Suppression Window (seconds)
parameters.description: Time window in seconds for polling noise deduplication. Only applies when Suppress Polling Noise is enabled.

parameters.name: raw_handling
parameters.label: Raw Event Handling
parameters.description: Control _raw field after field extraction. 'keep' preserves the original, 'truncate' keeps first 256 characters, 'remove' drops _raw entirely.

parameters.name: remove_intermediate_fields
parameters.label: Remove Intermediate Fields
parameters.description: Remove temporary and duplicate fields after processing (security_event_key, config_status, operation_status, session_user, session_ip, message_type, facility_description, syslog_severity).

parameters.name: severity_routing
parameters.label: Severity-Based Routing
parameters.description: Route INFO and CLEAR severity alarm events to a secondary output. Suppresses alarm flapping (rapid raise/clear cycles).

parameters.name: enable_mitre_enrichment
parameters.label: MITRE ATT&CK Enrichment
parameters.description: Control when MITRE ATT&CK fields are added. 'all' enriches every event, 'security_only' enriches only security-relevant events, 'off' disables MITRE enrichment.
